jcr:content.jcr:description: There are several options to shop for the best running shoes with Altra! We offer free shipping, purchase financing, and SmartGift for seamless gift giving.
jcr:content.jcr:title: Easy Shopping with Altra

text.text:
SHOPPING WITH ALTRA IS EASY

More shopping options means less shopping stress.

text_128428482.text: Four easy payments, zero interest.

text_1044783877.text:
1. PICK YOUR PRODUCT(S)
Add them to your cart.

2. SELECT KLARNA AT CHECKOUT
To automatically split your purchase into four payments, one every two weeks.

3. PLACE YOUR ORDER
We'll ship it out to you.

text_128428482_copy.text: Send a gift to their smartphone in three easy steps.

text_1044783877_copy.text:
1. YOU PICK OUT A GIFT
We'll send them a link via text or email.

2. THEY PERFECT IT
They can accept it, change the size or color, or choose something else of equal value. 

3. WE DELIVER IT
We'll send you an easy delivery link. They'll just need to provide a delivery address.

text_128428482_copy.text: Purchases made online at altrarunning.com between November 1, 2021 and December 25, 2021 are eligible for our extended holiday return window. Learn more.
